modName: Armor and weapons from Inheritance Cycle books
summary: This mod contains weapons and armor based on those mentioned in the Inheritance cycle books, and a few extra items!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a chest in Dragons reach, containing various weapons and armor based on those found in the Inheritance cycle books.Â  These are:
<br />
<br />Zar'roc
<br />Brisingr - has fire damage inchantment
<br />Naegling
<br />Tamerlein
<br />Tinkeldeath - has frost damage inchantment
<br />Volund
<br />Eragon's Bow - has dragon damage inchantment (+100 arrows)
<br />Riders dagger - has inchantment
<br />2x Rider's staff - one flame, one sparks
<br />Full set of Deadric armor with sheild
<br />Full set of Dwarven armor with sheld
<br />Full set of light armor
<br />Full set of robes with boots and an inchanted circlet
author: Kelly Williams
